name: Pocket Zombie Survival
description:
Pocket Zombie Survival is a free FPS zombie shooter that is all about surviving for as long as you can. With three different weapons to play with, and more to come, Pocket Zombie Survival features colorful 3D graphics and casual fps game play that caters both midcore to hardcore shooting game enthusiasts.

So lock and load, and get ready to mow down waves of zombies and heavies coming your way.
